attributes.action: Stop Dishonoured Micheal Martin from being honoured for dishonourable behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not think it right to give any honours to Micheal Martin the soon to be Ex Speaker. Reward for bringing dishonour to The Palace of Westminister is bad enough, but expecting our Queen to bestow an honour on such a person is appalling.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
